description:
Find objects, decorate, and complete missions in this cozy hidden-object game where you can create your little paradises!

See the world through the lens of aspiring photographer Laly alongside Coronya the Fairy, finding objects, decorating, and completing different missions to become the best photographer!

Create little paradises and share them with your friends and fellow photographers from around the world!

Game Features
- Explore and find objects hidden across four different zones!
- Discover cozy and cute characters and scenarios!
Find and move objects to decorate paradises and complete missions
- Hide objects around paradises for your friends to find!
- Play with little paradises created by players from anywhere in the world!

Ogre Pixel
2024
name: Hidden in my Paradise
intro: Hidden-object adventure where you can decorate to complete missions and create levels!
